name: Split Yourself
description:
Split yourself puts you in a place where you must protect your base from tanks and bombs.But, you can't shot, weapons are obsolete. You only have a really cool scarf. This scarf can be split in multiple mini-scarves. Your scarf can also deflect bullets and more importantly, it can be used as a grappling hook to move objects.

Controls

Movement : WASD / Arrow keys

Split : Spacebar
